title: Commander Keen Doom mod
content:
For the past several months, I've been working on a Doom TC of Commander Keen. Although I've made some progress, distractions like school and stuff have made the process very slow. And unfortunately, drawing up all the 3d sprites and textures is a daunting task. I've only finished 6 characters, and have done varying amounts of work on 5 others. I've drawn a fair amount of textures, possibly enough to begin mapping, but there's a lot that have not yet been edited. And, of course, I HAVEN'T begun mapping yet, so...if I try and do this all alone, it will take a LONG time. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-oldy.gif[/img]

I've come to the conclusion that, if I want to see this finished, I'll probably need help with it. So if there's anybody who has experience with Doom mapping and would like to help, then I would REALLY appreciate the assistance. Also, I would appreciate help with drawing textures and probably also the sprites. Those, at least, are similar enough to drawing for Commander Keen (since I'm drawing the whole thing in a cartoon Keenesque style). Again, help would be loverly!

EDIT: Screenshots coming shortly. Maybe...

title: Re: Commander Keen Doom mod
content:
I'd love to help, but have no experience whatsoever, sorry. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-sad.gif[/img] [img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v499/Nevad/menbun.gif[/img]

Awww! Feel the love!
